item.title: Cinder Forests
item.description: Cinder Forest A huge forest betweem the city of Dun Ard and Lhora, the Cinder Forests are a vast expanse of woods dominated by plantlife that coexists with and utilizes the natural fires that occur frequently within this region.

item.title: Dun Ard
item.description: Dun Ard Long, marble streets adorned with brass finishings and rows of specially bred cinder-trees, their saffron-yellow leaves littering the streets, children in tunics weave through the multi-tiered city At the end of a long, wide boulevard hedged with that same bright greenery lays a wide, Country is a republic, but with massive amounts of corruption and nepotism.

item.title: Landmasses
item.description: Northern Continent Bruma Western Continent Eupati Eastern Continent Azi

item.title: Lhora
item.description: Lhora ** As the mouth of the cave opens up, you all see the dim lights of a town draped by fog.

item.title: Locations
item.description: Lhora Cinder Forests Khassar Dun Ard Roslair

item.title: Roslair
item.description: Roslair is a temple state built atop the body of a slumbering, migratory crab, south of Lhora, and bordering the central sea.
